pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multichannel Wavelet Deconvolution with Additive Long Memory Noise // Computes the Wavelet deconvolution estimate of a common signal present in multiple channels that have possible different levels of blur and long memory additive error, see Kulik, Sapatinas and Wishart (2015), doi:10.1016/j.acha.2014.04.004.
